Description: Glazed composition shabti of Padiheka with a striated lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard, parallel hands in relief holding an adze, a hoe and the string of the seed-basket which hangs over the shoulder, the leg section is inscribed with part of Chapter 6 of the Book of The Dead in ten rows of incised Hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
